name: Cute cookie maker
description:
Prepare yourself for some realy fun cooking simulation!

Mix the dough, shape it up and add anything you like on it,
Play with all the functions and make your own cookies from scratch!

You can also bake your cookies from the ready made ones.

Put som sprinkles on them to top it up with that little extra and become the master chef of the family.

A fun simulation game for any age to play,
really popular amoung the younger players from all over the world.
